import os
import re
import time
import shutil
import zipfile
from lxml import etree
from os.path import abspath
from os.path import basename
from os.path import join
from PIL import Image
from PIL.ExifTags import TAGS
from warnings import warn
import logging

nsprefixes = {'mo':
    'http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/mac/office/2008/main', 'o':
    'urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office', 've':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006', 'w':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/wordprocessingml/2006/main', 'w10':
    'urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:word', 'wne':
    'http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/word/2006/wordml', 'a':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/drawingml/2006/main', 'm':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/officeDocument/2006/math', 'mv':
    'urn:schemas-microsoft-com:mac:vml', 'pic':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/drawingml/2006/picture', 'v':
    'urn:schemas-microsoft.com:vml', 'wp':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/drawingml/2006/wordprocessingDrawing',
    'cp':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/metadata/core-properties',
    'dc': 'http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/', 'ep':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/officeDocument/2006/extended-properties'
    , 'xsi': 'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance', 'ct':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/content-types', 'r':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/officeDocument/2006/relationships',
    'pr': 'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships',
    'dcmitype': 'http://purl.org/dc/dcmitype/', 'dcterms':
    'http://purl.org/dc/terms/'}


def makeelement(tagname, tagtext=None, nsprefix='w', attributes=None,
    attrnsprefix=None):
    # Determine the namespace URI based on the prefix
    ns_uri = nsprefixes.get(nsprefix, None)
    
    # Create the element with the specified tag name and namespace
    if ns_uri:
        element = etree.Element(f"{{{ns_uri}}}{tagname}")
    else:
        element = etree.Element(tagname)

    # Set the text content of the element if provided
    if tagtext is not None:
        element.text = tagtext

    # Add attributes if provided
    if attributes:
        for attr_name, attr_value in attributes.items():
            # Determine the attribute namespace
            if attrnsprefix:
                attr_ns_uri = nsprefixes.get(attrnsprefix, None)
                if attr_ns_uri:
                    element.set(f"{{{attr_ns_uri}}}{attr_name}", attr_value)
                else:
                    element.set(attr_name, attr_value)
            else:
                element.set(attr_name, attr_value)

    return element

test_code_list.test_code:
import os
import lxml
from docx import table
import shutil
def testmakeelement():
    """Ensure custom elements get created"""
    testelement = makeelement('testname', attributes={'testattribute':
        'testvalue'}, tagtext='testtagtext')
    assert testelement.tag == '{http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/wordprocessingml/2006/main}testname'
    assert testelement.attrib == {
        '{http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/wordprocessingml/2006/main}testattribute'
        : 'testvalue'}
    assert testelement.text == 'testtagtext'

testmakeelement()

response:
import os
import re
import time
import shutil
import zipfile
from lxml import etree
from os.path import abspath
from os.path import basename
from os.path import join
from PIL import Image
from PIL.ExifTags import TAGS
from warnings import warn
import logging

nsprefixes = {'mo':
    'http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/mac/office/2008/main', 'o':
    'urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office', 've':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006', 'w':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/wordprocessingml/2006/main', 'w10':
    'urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:word', 'wne':
    'http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/word/2006/wordml', 'a':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/drawingml/2006/main', 'm':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/officeDocument/2006/math', 'mv':
    'urn:schemas-microsoft-com:mac:vml', 'pic':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/drawingml/2006/picture', 'v':
    'urn:schemas.microsoft.com:vml', 'wp':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/drawingml/2006/wordprocessingDrawing',
    'cp':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/metadata/core-properties',
    'dc': 'http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/', 'ep':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/officeDocument/2006/extended-properties'
    , 'xsi': 'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance', 'ct':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/content-types', 'r':
    'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/officeDocument/2006/relationships',
    'pr': 'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships',
    'dcmitype': 'http://purl.org/dc/dcmitype/', 'dcterms':
    'http://purl.org/dc/terms/'}


def makeelement(tagname, tagtext=None, nsprefix='w', attributes=None,
    attrnsprefix=None):
    """Create an element & return it"""
    namespacemap = None
    if isinstance(nsprefix, list):
        namespacemap = {}
        for prefix in nsprefix:
            namespacemap[prefix] = nsprefixes[prefix]
        nsprefix = nsprefix[0]
    if nsprefix:
        namespace = '{%s}' % nsprefixes[nsprefix]
    else:
        namespace = ''
    newelement = etree.Element(namespace + tagname, nsmap=namespacemap)
    if attributes:
        if not attrnsprefix:
            if nsprefix == 'w':
                attributenamespace = namespace
            else:
                attributenamespace = ''
        else:
            attributenamespace = '{' + nsprefixes[attrnsprefix] + '}'
        for tagattribute in attributes:
            newelement.set(attributenamespace + tagattribute, attributes[
                tagattribute])
    if tagtext:
        newelement.text = tagtext
    return newelement


def paragraph(paratext, style='BodyText', breakbefore=False, jc='left'):
    """Creates a new paragraph element with the specified text, style, and alignment."""
    # Create the paragraph element
    attributes = {'style': style, 'jc': jc}
    if breakbefore:
        attributes['breakbefore'] = 'true'
    
    paragraph_element = makeelement('p', nsprefix='w', attributes=attributes)

    # Handle the text input
    if isinstance(paratext, list):
        for text, formatting in paratext:
            run_element = makeelement('r', nsprefix='w')
            text_element = makeelement('t', text)
            run_element.append(text_element)
            if formatting == 'b':
                run_element.append(makeelement('b', nsprefix='w'))
            elif formatting == 'i':
                run_element.append(makeelement('i', nsprefix='w'))
            elif formatting == 'u':
                run_element.append(makeelement('u', nsprefix='w'))
            paragraph_element.append(run_element)
    else:
        run_element = makeelement('r', nsprefix='w')
        text_element = makeelement('t', paratext)
        run_element.append(text_element)
        paragraph_element.append(run_element)

    return paragraph_element

test_code_list.test_code:
import os
import lxml
from docx import table
import shutil
def testparagraph():
    """Ensure paragraph creates p elements"""
    testpara = paragraph('paratext', style='BodyText')
    assert testpara.tag == '{http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/wordprocessingml/2006/main}p'
    pass

testparagraph()
